duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Manager and Assistant Manager to ensure the smooth and efficient running of the Store.
Provide coaching and mentoring to the sales team, modeling behaviors for outstanding customer service.
Carry out start and end of day cash reconciliation and store opening and closing on a rotational basis.
Work retail hours including days, nights, weekends, and special events in a fast-paced work environment.

education_certification.credential: Proven retail experience, preferably within cosmetics
